title: Update failed
body:
I open my lol and see  its was updating but when i have beetween 700 and 1100 files scanned it writing Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

What should i do?

replies.body: I'd like to help you out but need just a little more info!  At what percent in the patcher exactly is this happening?  I ask because the patcher is running a different process based on when you are receiving the error.  Let me know!
